mapper.select: select* from ( select rownum rn, a.* from (SELECT s.*, d.sd_number FROM g_s s INNER JOIN g_s_detail d ON s.g_id = d.g_id AND s.s_number = d.s_number WHERE s.g_id = #{g_id} AND s.s_isdeleted = 0 AND d.sd_isend = 0 order by s.s_number desc)a ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT s.*, d.sd_number FROM g_s s INNER JOIN g_s_detail d ON s.g_id = d.g_id AND s.s_number = d.s_number WHERE s.g_id = #{g_id} AND s.s_isdeleted = 0 AND d.sd_isend = 0)b WHERE b.s_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY b.s_number desc ) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT s.*, d.sd_number FROM g_s s INNER JOIN g_s_detail d ON s.g_id = d.g_id AND s.s_number = d.s_number WHERE s.g_id = #{g_id} AND s.s_isdeleted = 0 AND d.sd_isend = 0 order by s.s_number desc
